patthana11.8:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.8:2.1: Nakusalaṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana11.8:3.1: Nakusalaṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:4.1: Nakusalaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana11.8:6.1: Nakusalaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:7.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.8:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naanuppannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nauppādiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:9.1: Nakusalaṃ naatītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naanāgataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:11.1: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nabahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:12.1: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.8:13.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
